theJungle:GremlinQuiz.NAME: Gremlin Quiz Show
DESCRIPTIONS: " LIGHTS. CAMERA. #p@ACTION!@ " NL NL A gremlin with a wide smile approaches you. NL NL "It's time again for the Spire-Famous Gremlin Quiz Show! I've got three questions for you, here's your chance to win some #gfabulous #gprizes! NL Are you ~R~ ~E~ ~A~ ~D~ ~Y~ ~?~ Of course you are!"
What is the name of the Bronze Automaton's biggest attack?
Identify the enemies in this picture.
In what order (from left to right) do the Red Mask Bandits appear?
What is NOT a card for The Silent?
